title: Dont do Boost, kids!
body:
Or you may end up like this Yasuo.

This seems like it will be good for a combination of warning and fresh memes.

replies.body: What's wrong with flat mr blues?
just that the opposing team had a mostly AD team, and since this is diamond, one might expect someone to have a runepage with armor instead of MR for just such an occasion.

MR is still useful against Zed since his passive is magic damage. 
What else are you going to put on your blues? CDR? {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
Damn, I didn't even know Zed's passive was magic damage but you are right. Idk, I think we agree that this is a stupid post anyway.
I don't understand the part on the right and the part on the left, why did you add those?
a diamond 5 yasuo going 1/12 against a bronze 5 Zed.
Oh, well he should have replaced the Summoner Icons with icons of the champions played.
Probably, but I think he just took a screenshot of the site op.gg and quickly cobbled it together.
